"近衛兵": "I wouldn't call it a reward, but shall we fight one time before you leave? You seem frustrated."
"Fufu, it was just a joke. I know there's a time and place for these things. This isn't the right time."
"Ms. Hitsugi, was it? She's got a very determined expression, now. She feels like a completely different person from last time."
"Not only Ms. Hitsugi, but those around her... they all have very strong wills. Very human-like."
"While I'm sure you can't take credit for everything, because you were there, they were able to make those determined expressions. I think that's wonderful."
"The strength of people's will, and the beauty of their desires... I wonder why he can't understand that."
"Even though people today can move forward with their own two hands-"

"This is...
...A person turning into a Phantom?!"
"What have you done...? Ardem... Are you saying this is the evolution you desire?!"
